rules: Rule1: If the conservation board approved the funding proposal, then the project team launched the forest restoration.
Rule2: If the project team submitted the environmental impact report, then the conservation board approved the funding proposal.
Rule3: Either the project team submitted the environmental impact report or the ecologists completed the habitat assessment.
Rule4: If the ecologists completed the habitat assessment, then the conservation board approved the funding proposal.
Rule5: If the conservation board initiated an emergency review, then management halted the conservation project.
Rule6: If the project team requested additional funding, then the conservation board initiated an emergency review.
Rule7: If the project team did not launch the forest restoration, then the project team requested additional funding.
facts: Fact1: Management did not halt the conservation project.

question: The project team launched the forest restoration.
